reason.tex: \begin{align} \text{Let }z = x-\frac\pi{2}&\implies x = z + \frac\pi{2} \\ \text{Also, as }x\to\frac\pi{2} &, z\to 0 \\ \therefore \lim_{x\to\frac\pi{2}}\left(\dfrac{\cos x}{x-\frac\pi{2}}\right) &= \lim_{z\to 0}\left[\dfrac{\cos\left( z+\frac\pi{2}\right)}{z}\right] \\ &= \underbrace{\lim_{z\to 0}\dfrac{-\sin z}{z}}_{\cos\left(\frac\pi{2}+\theta\right) = -\sin\theta} \\ &= -1\cdot\lim_{z\to 0}\dfrac{\sin z}{z} = -1 \end{align}
